name: Village Story
description: The main objective of the game is to build your town, which the player must not only build and develop, but also to protect against unfriendly natives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
